ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50; Species: Pimephales promelas (fathead minnow); Conditions: flow-through bioassay with measured concentrations, 25.6 °C, dissolved oxygen 7.0 mg/L, hardness 46.0 mg/L CaCO3, alkalinity 309 mg/L CaCO3, and pH 7.88; Concentration: 897 mg/L for 96 hr (confidence limit not reliable)

EC50; Species: Pimephales promelas (fathead minnow); Conditions: flow-through bioassay with measured concentrations, 25.6 °C, dissolved oxygen 7.0 mg/L, hardness 46.0 mg/L CaCO3, alkalinity 309 mg/L CaCO3, and pH 7.88; Concentration: 772 mg/L for 96 hr (confidence limit: 704-846 mg/L); Effect: loss of equilibrium
